name: Pacifist Magician
description:
I steal to sell but I don't kill to steal.

Most magicians use the most diabolical spells to get what 

they want. Spells that could kill.

I am not a big fan of violence.

I am a pacifist after all.

Enter dungeons to steal treasures. Use your magic squares to not kill but stun your enemies in this simple platformer that is definitely not going to be game of the year.
